channel.title: How do you play client music
channel.description: Hi i want to play music from the mopar client useing my servers music tab how do I make a case that can do this?

item.description:
@dedripper wrote:

i dont want to add new music mopar has music already in his client i want to play that

item.title: How do you play client music
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

doing this is client side, so i would suggest posting this in the client hacking section, also i believe there is a tutorial on a client music system on rune-server

you also need a client (editable) so using moparâ€™s client wont work
